modShortDescription: Here is a 7 Days to Die mod to add images to your Login Screen as well as your Crafting Menu. Requires some editing on your part.
modDescription:
Here is a 7 Days to Die mod to add images to your **Login Screen** as well as your **Crafting Menu**.

Requires some editing on your part. To use, your image has to be online and replace “**YOURIMGHERE**” with the direct url to that image.

**[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1fn4xSFvSrhUy6zjG3w-YZCixCUyKW2l8)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/13211-ragnarok-screen-images/).

**Credits:** Ragnarok
